articles.description: Latest football news and build-up to the Champions League quarter-final ties as Arsenal host Bayern Munich and Manchester City travel to Real Madrid.
articles.title: Football latest and Champions League build-up

articles.description: The manner in which financial-rule breaches are dealt with "makes a mockery of the Premier League", says Luton midfielder Andros Townsend.
articles.title: Everton issue 'makes mockery of Premier League'

articles.description: The furthest inside the ropes, the closest to the stars - a caddie's role extends far beyond carrying bags and wiping clubs.
articles.title: Masters 2024: 'A sporting role like no other' - the role of a golf caddie

articles.description: Arsenal may have thought they had seen the back of Harry Kane, but he returns looking to dump them out of the Champions League.
articles.title: Can Bayern's Kane haunt Arsenal again?

articles.description: Uefa is considering increasing squad sizes for this summer's European Championships to 26 players following talks with coaches.
articles.title: Uefa considering increasing Euro 2024 squad sizes

articles.description: Vinicius Jr has overcome the odds to reach the top, but nothing could have prepared him for what he would face in Spain.
articles.title: 'I've never seen a player persecuted like Vinicius'

articles.description: Mayank Yadav from Delhi has been described as a "child of the wind" by former West Indian pacer Ian Bishop.
articles.title: IPL: India's pace sensation Mayank Yadav lights up tournament

articles.description: Leah Williamson will make her first England appearance in a year in Tuesday's Euro 2025 qualifier against the Republic of Ireland.
articles.title: Williamson to start for England against Republic of Ireland

articles.description: Micah Richards tells Gary Lineker and Alan Shearer what went wrong for Aston Villa in 2015-16 on the latest episode of Match of the Day: Top 10.
articles.title: 'I got a taxi to training to avoid the fans'

articles.description: LIV golfer Joaquin Niemann says the breakaway tour must be recognised in the official world rankings as the current system is "a lie".
articles.title: LIV golfer Joaquin Niemann wants unified rankings as he prepares for 2024 Masters
